TEXT.English: *BUG Hint*: Examine what resources are available before researching worker techs.
TEXT.Chinese: *BUG Hint*: Examine what resources are available before researching worker techs.

TEXT.English: *BUG Hint*: Always consider escorting your Settlers. It's mighty dangerous out in the Wilderness.
TEXT.Chinese: *BUG Hint*: Always consider escorting your Settlers. It's mighty dangerous out in the Wilderness.

TEXT.English: *BUG Hint*: When at War, use fast moving units to pillage strategic resources such as Iron, or Aluminum first, and leave a sentry to prevent the enemy from reconnecting that resource.
TEXT.Chinese: *BUG Hint*: When at War, use fast moving units to pillage strategic resources such as Iron, or Aluminum first, and leave a sentry to prevent the enemy from reconnecting that resource.

TEXT.English: *BUG Hint*: Speak softly and carry a big stick, and you will go far.
TEXT.Chinese: *BUG Hint*: Speak softly and carry a big stick, and you will go far.

TEXT.English: *BUG Hint*: Be the first to circle the globe, and your Naval Units all receive +1 movement.
TEXT.Chinese: *BUG Hint*: Be the first to circle the globe, and your Naval Units all receive +1 movement.

TEXT.English: *BUG Hint*: To cancel all Worker Orders quickly, select 1 worker with orders, and while holding the [ALT] key, click the cancel orders button.
TEXT.Chinese: *BUG Hint*: To cancel all Worker Orders quickly, select 1 worker with orders, and while holding the [ALT] key, click the cancel orders button.

TEXT.English: *BUG Hint*: Ever forget to build that Barracks? [ALT +M] -OR- [ALT + CTRL + R] will allow you to set up reminders so you don't forget again!
TEXT.Chinese: *BUG Hint*: Ever forget to build that Barracks? [ALT +M] -OR- [ALT + CTRL + R] will allow you to set up reminders so you don't forget again!

TEXT.English: *BUG Hint*: Never go up against a Sicilian when death is on the line.
TEXT.Chinese: *BUG Hint*: Never go up against a Sicilian when death is on the line.

TEXT.English: *BUG Hint*: Selling resources that you no longer use, such as copper or iron, can pay off nicely over the long run.
TEXT.Chinese: *BUG Hint*: Selling resources that you no longer use, such as copper or iron, can pay off nicely over the long run.

TEXT.English: *BUG Hint*: Form trade relations with nations that get along with each other to avoid an diplomatic repercussions.
TEXT.Chinese: *BUG Hint*: Form trade relations with nations that get along with each other to avoid an diplomatic repercussions.

TEXT.English: *BUG Hint*: [ALT + S] allows you to make Sticky Notes on tiles. Just click and type. Pressing [ALT + S] again, and then clicking on an existing note will remove it.
TEXT.Chinese: *BUG Hint*: [ALT + S] allows you to make Sticky Notes on tiles. Just click and type. Pressing [ALT + S] again, and then clicking on an existing note will remove it.

TEXT.English: *BUG Hint*: To create rally points, select the city, or cities, you are building units it, hold down the [SHIFT] key and Right Click on the tile you want your rally point to be at. You will see a yellow circle showing the rally point.[NEWLINE]To cancel orders select the same city or cities, [SHIFT] and Right click on any city square, and it will cancel the rally orders.
TEXT.Chinese: *BUG Hint*: To create rally points, select the city, or cities, you are building units it, hold down the [SHIFT] key and Right Click on the tile you want your rally point to be at. You will see a yellow circle showing the rally point.[NEWLINE]To cancel orders select the same city or cities, [SHIFT] and Right click on any city square, and it will cancel the rally orders.

TEXT.English: *BUG Hint*: Station naval units near your water based resources, and put them on Sea Patrol to protect your resources.
TEXT.Chinese: *BUG Hint*: Station naval units near your water based resources, and put them on Sea Patrol to protect your resources.

TEXT.English: *BUG Hint*: When selling Technologies, shop around for the highest bidder, and then work your way down.
TEXT.Chinese: *BUG Hint*: When selling Technologies, shop around for the highest bidder, and then work your way down.

TEXT.English: *BUG Hint*: Be nice to your mother.
TEXT.Chinese: *BUG Hint*: Be nice to your mother.

TEXT.English: *BUG Hint*: When you're weak there is no shame in giving into rivals demands. This will give you time to build your defenses as you enjoy the short improvement in relations between your nations.
TEXT.Chinese: *BUG Hint*: When you're weak there is no shame in giving into rivals demands. This will give you time to build your defenses as you enjoy the short improvement in relations between your nations.

TEXT.English: *BUG Hint*: [ALT + E] will allow you to make a custom Event in the autologger.
TEXT.Chinese: *BUG Hint*: [ALT + E] will allow you to make a custom Event in the autologger.

TEXT.English: *BUG Hint*: Play to your Civilization's traits, and specialize your Empire. No use being Charismatic and Aggressive and never starting a war.
TEXT.Chinese: *BUG Hint*: Play to your Civilization's traits, and specialize your Empire. No use being Charismatic and Aggressive and never starting a war.

TEXT.English: *BUG Hint*: Animals can't enter your land, so it can be worth the risk to leave your city undefended and use your warrior for early exploration.
TEXT.Chinese: *BUG Hint*: Animals can't enter your land, so it can be worth the risk to leave your city undefended and use your warrior for early exploration.

TEXT.English: *BUG Hint*: Watch your neighbors' civics changes. A change from Free Religion to Theocracy could mean an arms build-up.
TEXT.Chinese: *BUG Hint*: Watch your neighbors' civics changes. A change from Free Religion to Theocracy could mean an arms build-up.

TEXT.English: *BUG Hint*: When a tile is in the City Cross of two different cities, you can change its city ownership by clicking on that tile from the chosen city's City Screen.
TEXT.Chinese: *BUG Hint*: When a tile is in the City Cross of two different cities, you can change its city ownership by clicking on that tile from the chosen city's City Screen.

TEXT.English: *BUG Hint*: The cake is a lie.
TEXT.Chinese: *BUG Hint*: The cake is a lie.

TEXT.English: *BUG Hint*: Press [ALT + CTRL + O] to enter The BUG Mod Options Screen.
TEXT.Chinese: *BUG Hint*: Press [ALT + CTRL + O] to enter The BUG Mod Options Screen.

TEXT.English: *BUG Hint*: Always consider having siege equipment before attacking a city. A Swordsman can do more damage entering through a hole in the wall, then trying to climb over it with arrows raining down from above.
TEXT.Chinese: *BUG Hint*: Always consider having siege equipment before attacking a city. A Swordsman can do more damage entering through a hole in the wall, then trying to climb over it with arrows raining down from above.

TEXT.English: *BUG Hint*: Clicking on the Scroll button within the Domestic Advisor will allow you to customize it to your playing style.
TEXT.Chinese: *BUG Hint*: Clicking on the Scroll button within the Domestic Advisor will allow you to customize it to your playing style.

TEXT.English: *BUG Hint*: If you neglect your military, and your power becomes weak, a neighbor WILL attack you.
TEXT.Chinese: *BUG Hint*: If you neglect your military, and your power becomes weak, a neighbor WILL attack you.

TEXT.English: *BUG Hint*: Don't neglect your Diplomacy! Pay attention to the information you gather, telling you what is available out there.
TEXT.Chinese: *BUG Hint*: Don't neglect your Diplomacy! Pay attention to the information you gather, telling you what is available out there.

TEXT.English: *BUG Hint*: Sometimes it's better to stop a Scout or Explorer on a forest, hill, or jungle tile and lose the extra movement in favor of safety.
TEXT.Chinese: *BUG Hint*: Sometimes it's better to stop a Scout or Explorer on a forest, hill, or jungle tile and lose the extra movement in favor of safety.

TEXT.English: *BUG Hint*: Save your promotions for when your unit is injured to speed up healing, and when you promote, use them to tailor your unit for the type of enemy you are facing.
TEXT.Chinese: *BUG Hint*: Save your promotions for when your unit is injured to speed up healing, and when you promote, use them to tailor your unit for the type of enemy you are facing.
